gov.va.vinci.leo.cr

Class FileCollectionReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.uima.resource.Resource_ImplBase
      • org.apache.uima.resource.ConfigurableResource_ImplBase
        • org.apache.uima.collection.CollectionReader_ImplBase
          • gov.va.vinci.leo.cr.BaseLeoCollectionReader
            • gov.va.vinci.leo.cr.BaseFileCollectionReader
              • gov.va.vinci.leo.cr.FileCollectionReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LeoCollectionReaderInterface, org.apache.uima.collection.base_cpm.BaseCollectionReader, org.apache.uima.collection.CollectionReader, org.apache.uima.resource.ConfigurableResource, org.apache.uima.resource.Resource

    public class FileCollectionReader
extends BaseFileCollectionReader
    Get a list of the files in a directory and return them one at a time. Optionally a recurse flag can also be set which causes the reader to search recursively through the entire folder structure of the parent directory.

    Note: Collection readers, to be used within UIMA, need to be generated via the CollectionReader factory.

    For example, a file subreader would be created via: 

     CollectionReader reader = CollectionReaderFactory
                                  .generateFileSubReader(new File("my-input-directory/sub-dir/"), true);
    Author:
    thomasginter

      • FileCollectionReader

        public FileCollectionReader(File inputDirectory,
                    boolean recurse,
                    TextFilter... filterList)
        Constructor that takes an input directory path and recurse flag as inputs.
        Parameters:
        inputDirectory - Path to the input directory to be read.
        recurse - If true then recursively search sub-directories for files to process.
        filterList - List of TextFilter objects to apply to the text before it is set in the CAS.

      • FileCollectionReader

        public FileCollectionReader(File inputDirectory,
                    boolean recurse,
                    org.apache.commons.io.filefilter.SuffixFileFilter fileExtension,
                    TextFilter... filterList)
        Constructor that takes an input directory path and recurse flag as inputs.
        Parameters:
        inputDirectory - Path to the input directory to be read.
        recurse - If true then recursively search sub-directories for files to process.
        fileExtension - The file extension to limit to, ie = ".txt" or ".doc"
        filterList - List of TextFilter objects to apply to the text before it is set in the CAS.

      • FileCollectionReader

        public FileCollectionReader(File inputDirectory,
                    String encoding,
                    boolean recurse,

        Constructor that takes an input directory path and recurse flag as inputs.
        Parameters:
        inputDirectory - Path to the input directory to be read.
        encoding - Encoding format for processing string input data.
        recurse - If true then recursively search sub-directories for files to process.
        fileExtension - The file extension to limit to, ie = ".txt" or ".doc"
        filterList - List of TextFilter objects to apply to the text before it is set in the CAS.
